content: k1 from there k1 k2togbl knit to end of round round 2 knit across all stitches repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have half your original stitches remaining now work decrease row round 1 every round until 8 stitches remain cut yarn leaving a generous tail for weaving in draw the end through the remaining stitches and pull them tight golden gardens socks | fairlight fibers | fairlightfibers com leg chart read from top down toe chart read from top down golden gardens socks | fairlight fibers | fairlightfibers com golden gardens socks | fairlight fibers | fairlightfibers com golden gardens socks | fairlight fibers | fairlightfibers com
